title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: plain compound twill
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 31.1 x 35.9 cm (12 1/4 x 14 1/8 in.)
description: Tan ground.  Wide band down left side with a light tan background, horizontal black stripes and wide green bands with diamonds. The rest of the field has thin vertical stripes with a grouping of gold and silver flowers with green leaves.  At top , alternating with the thin stripes, are groups of small horizontal stripes in black, yellow, orange, white, and green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile. Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: plain compound twill. 1937-34-7.
